channel.title: Softlayer_software_description on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_software_description on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description Service Datatype Description Methods getAllObjects getAttributes getAverageInstallationDuration Retrieve the average amount of time that a software description takes to install. getCompatibleSoftwareDescriptions Retrieve a list of the software descriptions that are compatible with this software description. getCustomerOwnedLicenseDescriptions getFeatures Retrieve the feature attributes of a software description. getLatestVersion Retrieve the latest version of a software description.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description Datatype Description This class holds a description for a specific installation of a Software Component. SoftLayer_Software_Licenses tie a Software Component (A specific installation on a piece of hardware) to it’s description. The “Manufacturer” and “Name” properties of a SoftLayer_Software_Description are used by the framework to factory specific objects, objects that may have special methods for that specific piece of software, or objects that contain application specific data, such as default ports.

item.title: getProvisionTransactionGroup
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description::getProvisionTransactionGroup Overview Retrieve this details the provisioning transaction group for this software. This is only valid for Operating System software. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Software_DescriptionInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Software_DescriptionObjectMask SoftLayer_Software_DescriptionObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group

item.title: getReloadTransactionGroup
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description::getReloadTransactionGroup Overview Retrieve the transaction group that a software description belongs to. A transaction group is a sequence of transactions that must be performed in a specific order for the installation of software. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Software_DescriptionInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Software_DescriptionObjectMask SoftLayer_Software_DescriptionObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group
